scorings.justification: The user clearly expresses concern about unexpected charges on their bill related to data usage, which falls directly under the category of billing issues.
There is no mention of network problems or issues related to service performance.
The user does not indicate any desire to change their plan, upgrade, or downgrade their subscription.
There is no request for SIM or device support or mention of issues regarding a SIM or device.
While the user is seeking clarification regarding their account, the emphasis is primarily on billing issues without specific account management requests.

list: I am extremely nervous about this situation.
